attributes.action: introduce a requirement for an additional category for 4x4's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there should be an additional category on the UK Driving License for 4x4's obtainable by means of another test, this would hopefully put more people off buying non-environmentaly friendly 4x4's especialy those who don't intend on using them for their acctual purpose: using them offroad.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
